sect2.title: Syntax
sect2.para: This element occurs in the elements ; |

sect2.title: Description
sect2.para: The element unpack is used to specify the digest of the archive file to be unpacked, or of the file to be downloaded.
The attribute type is preset as an MD5 hash.

sect2.title: Examples
sect2.para: There is no equivalent Bash script example for this element.
